verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
It used to be darkness
Without you

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I lived my life in blindness
But now I'm found

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
And I'll sing, sing I love you so
And I'll sing
Because the world can't take away
Your love

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Found me in weakness
Broken
You came to me in kindness
And now I live

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
I give my life for you Lord
For all you've done
